attributes.action: Investigate the rules for disibility living allowance and make sure that the fraudsters are weeded out.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: currently there are thousands of people who are able to walk and lift heavy things but are recieveing the  mobility componenet of disability living allowance. giving them the automatic right to go on the motobility scheme. I petition the government to strictly vet every single person who is on this as alot are fraudulant claims. they can walk down to the high street and walk back again and they can pull bags of shopping on end. Yet they are still claiming dla higher mobility rate. this should stop.
